title: You Ever Seen Pearl Jam Live?
description:
Jay and Dan investigate a case of a missing woman who had previously been pulled over with her boyfriend by the police and DJ Lou defends his favorite band.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
